p: Treatment of a hepatitis C virus (HCV) infected patient, who was not eligible for IFN-α therapy, with capsules of N. sativa oil (450 mg) for 3 months (three times daily), significantly decreased the viral load and also improved oxidative stress due to augmented total antioxidant activity. Moreover, N. sativa oil improved red blood cells (RBC), platelet counts, total protein, and albumin in HCV-infected patient (Barakat et al. 2013).
